title: AirPods 3 fall to second-best price of $145 in today’s best deals, plus $150 off M1 iPad Pros
content:
Heading into the weekend, all of today’s best deals kick off with an Apple AirPods 3 discount via Woot for $145. That’s alongside up to $150 off the latest 11-inch M1 iPad Pros and Apple’s new iPad mini 6 starting from $459. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post AirPods 3 fall to second-best price of $145 in today’s best deals, plus $150 off M1 iPad Pros appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Over at Woot, a new Apple AirPods 3 discount has arrived to deliver the second-best price yet of $145, alongside M1 iPad Pro savings.
